messages.content: Yes Please is a 2014 book by American actress and television writer Amy Poehler. It's a collection of personal stories, funny bits, and real-life advice on topics such as sex, love, friendship, parenthood, and more. The book features chapters like "Treat Your Career Like a Bad Boyfriend" and "The Robots Will Kill Us All," and also includes an acrostic poem about Tina Fey.
